languages.translation_comment: если играется этюд DeathcultKillingRestriction — поднятый этюд означает, что РТ запретил Культу убивать

languages.text: "Кровавая паутина услышала твой приказ — ткачи более не отправляют души на другую сторону. Не все в культе были готовы к переменам. Жители туннелей оказались готовы еще меньше".
languages.translation_comment: если играется этюд DeathcultKillingRestriction — поднятый этюд означает, что РТ запретил Культу убивать

traits.locale_text: "Кровавая паутина услышала твой приказ — ткачи более не отправляют души на другую сторону. Не все в культе были готовы к переменам. Жители туннелей оказались готовы еще меньше".

languages.text: "The Bloodspun Web has heeded your orders. The spinners are no longer ushering souls to the other side. Not everyone in the cult was ready for the change, and the tunnel-dwellers were less ready still."
languages.original_text: "Кровавая паутина услышала твой приказ — ткачи более не отправляют души на другую сторону. Не все в культе были готовы к переменам. Жители туннелей оказались готовы еще меньше".

traits.locale_text: "The Bloodspun Web has heeded your orders. The weavers are no longer ushering souls to the other side. Not everyone in the cult was ready for the change. The tunnel-dwellers were less ready still."
"The Bloodspun Web has heeded your orders. The weavers are no longer ushering souls to the other side. Not everyone in the cult was ready for the change. The tunnel-dwellers were less ready still."

"The Bloodspun Web has heeded your orders. The weavers are no longer ushering souls to the other side. Not everyone in the cult was ready for the change, and the tunnel-dwellers were less ready still."

"The Bloodspun Web has heeded your orders. The weavers are no longer ushering souls to the other side. Not everyone in the cult was ready for the change, and the tunnel-dwellers were less ready still."

"The Bloodspun Web has heeded your orders. The spinners are no longer ushering souls to the other side. Not everyone in the cult was ready for the change, and the tunnel-dwellers were less ready still."

"The Bloodspun Web has heeded your orders. The spinners are no longer ushering souls to the other side. Not everyone in the cult was ready for the change, and the tunnel-dwellers were less ready still."

languages.text: «La Red Sanguinolenta ha obedecido sus órdenes. Los tejedores ya no envían almas al otro lado. No todos los miembros del culto estaban listos para el cambio, y los moradores de los túneles menos aún».
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web has heeded your orders. The spinners are no longer ushering souls to the other side. Not everyone in the cult was ready for the change, and the tunnel-dwellers were less ready still."

traits.locale_text: «La Red Sanguinolenta ha obedecido sus órdenes. Los tejedores ya no envían almas al otro lado. No todos los miembros del culto estaban listos para el cambio, y los moradores de los túneles menos aún».

languages.text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブがあなたの命令に従った。紡績工は、もはや魂をあちら側に導くことはない。教団の全員にその準備ができていたわけではなく、トンネルの住人たちは、さらに準備ができていなかった」
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web has heeded your orders. The spinners are no longer ushering souls to the other side. Not everyone in the cult was ready for the change, and the tunnel-dwellers were less ready still."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブがあなたの命令に従った。ウィーヴァーは、もはや魂をあちら側に導くことはない。教団の全員にその準備ができていたわけではなく、トンネルの住人たちは、さらに準備ができていなかった」

languages.text: “织血罗网听从你的命令，织网者不再把灵魂带到彼岸。并非所有成员都做好了应对这个变化的准备，至于住在隧道里的那些人，他们更是没有准备好。”
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web has heeded your orders. The spinners are no longer ushering souls to the other side. Not everyone in the cult was ready for the change, and the tunnel-dwellers were less ready still."

traits.locale_text: “织血罗网听从你的命令，织网者不再把灵魂带到彼岸。并非所有成员都做好了应对这个变化的准备，至于住在隧道里的那些人，他们更是没有准备好。”

languages.text: "Das Blutgesponnene Netz hat Eure Befehle befolgt. Die Spinner führen nicht länger Seelen auf die andere Seite. Nicht alle im Kult waren bereit für die Veränderung, vor allem nicht die Tunnelbewohner.
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web has heeded your orders. The spinners are no longer ushering souls to the other side. Not everyone in the cult was ready for the change, and the tunnel-dwellers were less ready still."

traits.locale_text: "Das Blutgesponnene Netz hat Eure Befehle befolgt. Die Spinner führen nicht länger Seelen auf die andere Seite. Nicht alle im Kult waren bereit für die Veränderung, vor allem nicht die Tunnelbewohner.

languages.text: « La Toile de Sang a tenu compte de vos ordres. Les tisseurs ont cessé de faire passer des âmes de l'autre côté. Tous nos membres n'étaient pas prêts pour un tel changement, et les habitants des tunnels l'étaient encore moins. »
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web has heeded your orders. The spinners are no longer ushering souls to the other side. Not everyone in the cult was ready for the change, and the tunnel-dwellers were less ready still."

traits.locale_text: « La Toile de Sang a tenu compte de vos ordres. Les tisseurs ont cessé de faire passer des âmes de l'autre côté. Tous nos membres n'étaient pas prêts pour un tel changement, et les habitants des tunnels l'étaient encore moins. »

languages.text: "Kanipi Ağı, emirlerine kulak verdi. Dokurlar artık ruhları öteki tarafa taşımıyor. Tarikattaki herkes değişime hazır değildi. Tünelde yaşayanlarsa henüz hiç hazır sayılmaz."
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web has heeded your orders. The spinners are no longer ushering souls to the other side. Not everyone in the cult was ready for the change, and the tunnel-dwellers were less ready still."
